rule: The <strong> and <em> tags must not be used to emphasize key words and phrases.
input: Hope fuels dreams. Vision leads to achievement. Aspirations guide actions.
validityText:
The input consists of three separate sentences: "Hope fuels dreams.", "Vision leads to achievement.", and "Aspirations guide actions.". This complies with the requirement that the input text must contain at least three separate sentences. The input is a paragraph of text and does not consist solely of whitespace characters. It includes a combination of letters and punctuation, but the specification allows for any combination of letters, numbers, symbols, and punctuation. Therefore, the input satisfies all parts of the specification.

OK
